division.title: Guide to CSS Pagination Engines
division.shortdesc: What CSS pagination engine should you choose and why?

body.p: As of spring 2018 there is no sufficiently complete open-source CSS pagination tool, which means you'll have to license a commercial tool in order to use CSS pagination. Fortunately, all the tools provide some form of evaluation license.
This topic provides a guide to the tools available as of spring 2018.
